metadata.title: CVE-2023-24023 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth BR/EDR devices with Secure Simple Pairing and Secure Connectionspairing in Bluetooth Core Specification 4.2 through 5.4 allow certainman-in-the-middle attacks that force a short key length, and might lead todiscovery of the encryption key and live injection, aka BLUFFS.
